infobox.Japanese title:: 町家カフェでの事件  (Machiya Kafe de no Jiken)
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Ran Mouri  Sonoko Suzuki  Juzo Megure  Wataru Takagi  Kazunobu Chiba

infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Wakana Yamazaki as Ran Mouri  Naoko Matsui as Sonoko Suzuki  Chafurin as Juzo Megure  Wataru Takagi as Wataru Takagi  Isshin Chiba as Kazunobu Chiba  Takuo Kawamura as Satoshi Tomita  Naoki Imamura as Kenji Nonaka  Fukushi Ochiai as Yoshihisa Furukawa  Takuya Eguchi as Chitose Sakai

sections.Situation:
Ran, Sonoko, and Conan are in a townhouse cafe, when later, the manager Satoshi Tomita is found unconscious on the floor.

The suspects are a part-time worker, a cafe owner in the neighborhood and a customer. The police suspects Nonaka because he didn't have an alibi, but Conan, with help of some clues, discovers the real culprit.
sections.People:
- Victim (beaten - injured)
- 37 years old
- "Sweets" café owner
- 19 years old
- Part-time worker
- College student
- 42 years old
- Rival café owner
- Regular customer
- 34 years old
- Customer
